text: How about allowing downloads direct from the file manager, if i want to edit a png and view the source it provides a webp which is great on the front end as i know it only provides it to compatible browsers. But if i’m editing I need the original asset for which i have to get from ftp at the moment.
Quick hack: open the file URL in Safari or another browser :slightly_smiling_face:

For most cases, we want to deliver the image in the most efficient format, but certainly there are situations where you want to have users download the original image. We’re working on something to enable that.
Yup, we’re working on something for this
would be nice if the design preview for modules gave an option to include external stylesheets
such as the primary css file the site uses
